DOC.brief_summary: Revision total hip replacement arthroplasty is a surgery having intra- and postoperative substantial blood loss. The investigators will investigate the relationship between the various hematologic variables and postoperative bleeding volume.
DOC.brief_title: Revision Total Hip Replacement Arthroplasty and Hematologic Variables
DOC.criteria: revision total hip replacement hematologic disease anticoagulant medication American Society of Anesthesiologists physical status 4 and 5
